pre_caption: In a close-up, overhead shot, a man's hands are positioned at the top center of the frame, holding two spinning tops side-by-side in the center. The top on the left has red and yellow paint, while the top on the right has pink and blue paint, all set against a wooden surface that fills the background. As the tops rotate in place, the paint is flung outwards from the center in thin, arcing streams. These streams create an expanding, web-like pattern of intersecting spirals on the surrounding wooden surface, while the hands and tops remain fixed in their central positions.
